page.title: 13Granby Industrial Estate.
page.content: The{Granby Industrial Estate}is{two {miles north}of the{town centre}on the {Bridport Road.}The Estate is a collection of different buildings for a large amount of{separate companies, like D.E.K.,a printing firm or S.T.C. Components. My Dad works for a company with branches all over the country.He is an assistant manager for British Central Electrical on the Granby.There are also companies that help with the {building industry.}Specializing in {DIY.are firms like Jewsons,U.B.M.,and {Wyke Regis Windows.}Big companies are also on the Estate.One of the biggest places is the{British Aerospace {Company.}D.E.K., a printing firm, is another company which has had offices built on the{Industrial Estate.Granby {Court}is a collection of{units rented by different Companies.More Firms are moving onto the Estate.-Terri Brazell.
